AUGUST 21, 2021

ZANG's parent company CHEFATHOME FOODTECH LLP @thechefathome.in mentioned in News, @dinakural_official

Thank you @wadhwanifoundation @wadhwani.nen @nen_wadhwani

#mediacoverage #startupstory #zang #zanger #zangbox #zanglife #cooking

Translation:
Chennai, 19 August 2021: CHEFATHOME is a company based on the idea of providing a complete culinary experience. It distinguishes itself from competing companies by offering exotic cooking, uncompromising quality and hygiene, as well as quick and reliable delivery solutions, providing a culinary experience at a low price. The idea of starting the company was conceived at IIT-Kanpur by the founders of CHEFATHOME when they were involved in the basic curriculum for entrepreneurship offered by the Wadhwani Foundation and the National Entrepreneur Network (NEN) in Kanpur. Its founders Mr Sukesh and Mr Vishwajit say, it turned out to be a life-changing experience for us and changed the mindset of the whole team. We learned a lot through Bootcamp - not only theoretical knowledge but also practical skills, which help us solve real-world problems today. We could not have come this far if the Wadhwani Foundation and National Entrepreneurs (NEN) editors had not tested our products. He said we are forever indebted to them.

CHEFATHOME has launched with nine key team members dealing with various sectors and has conducted a comprehensive competition analysis with its key competitors such as Swiggy, Zomato, MTR Ready Foods. Is now looking for partners to expand to other cities like Chennai, Hyderabad and Coimbatore by launching weekly and weekend meal plans...

Initially, we came up with the idea of online delivery of groceries and provisions but learnt that this simple idea alone is not sufficient for us to survive long in the market. Then we decided to pivot. The new idea we came up with is the online delivery of Cook-it-yourself Kits initially called KIRAKART now "CHEF@HOME"(rebranded now as ZANG). As the name Chef@Home suggests, we will provide all the key ingredients required to cook a dish along with a tutorial video of how to cook that dish through our app platform. Customers can choose from a wide variety of dishes and place orders to receive the Cook-it-yourself Kits at their doorstep. The Wadhwani Foundation Bootcamp helped us achieve a lot till date.

Our initial sales were of fruit and vegetable combo kits of which we made sales of 618 kits out of which 390 were sold along with our operational partner. Now we have got the famous South Indian chef, Mrs. Mallika Badrinath, as our food and nutrition advisor. We have kickstarted our operations in Chennai from June 15.
